validateJwt(String, MockJWTRepository) - Static method in class middlewareapd.util.ValidationUtil
Validates the JWT by checking its signature, UUID claim, and user role.
validateJwtSession(JWToken) - Static method in class middlewareapd.util.ValidationUtil
Validates the JWT session by checking if the JWT exists in the database and ensuring that the user has not logged out.
validateUserRole(Integer, int) - Static method in class middlewareapd.util.ValidationUtil
Validates the user's role by checking if the role from the database matches the role specified in the JWT.
validateUuid(String, String) - Static method in class middlewareapd.util.ValidationUtil
Validates the UUID by comparing the UUID extracted from the JWT with the one stored in the database.
ValidationUtil - Class in middlewareapd.util
